front.title: An IPv6/IPv4 Multicast Translator based on IGMP/MLD Proxying (mtp)

abstract.t: In the stage of the transition from IPv4 to IPv6 it is necessarythat IPv4 nodes and IPv6 nodes can communicate directly. This memoproposes a mechanism which enables such direct communication formulticast, in addition to that for unicast defined in [SIIT] and[NAT-PT].
